challenge.title: Get Property
challenge.description: Create a function called getProperty that takes in an object and a property name. Return the value of the property. If the object doesn't have the property, the function should return null.
challenge.answer: function getProperty(obj, propName) {    return obj.hasOwnProperty(propName) ? obj[propName] : null;  }

nextChallenge.title: Count Properties
nextChallenge.description: Create a function called countProperties that takes in an object. Return the number of properties the object has.
